abstract.t: This document describes a management interface adapted to constrained devices and constrained (e.g., low-power, lossy) networks. CoOL resources (datastores, protocol operations and notifications) are defined using the YANG modelling language [RFC6020]. Interactions with these resources are performed using the CoAP web transfer protocol [RFC7252]. Payloads and specific CoAP options are encoded using the CBOR data format [RFC7049].
